name: v11.7
body:
## Features
-

## Fixes
- Fixed issue #205 (Level gauge without % after the value)

## Features
- added new property to enable custom tick label font size (#204)

## Fixes
- Issue #204 fixed (custom tick label font size)

## Features
-

## Fixes
- Fix for issue #188

## Features
- added range property to Section

## Fixes
- Fix for issue #187

## Features
- Added an overview demo class that can be started with gradle Demo
- 

## Fixes
- Fix for issue #178 
- Fix for issue #181 
- Fix for issue #186

## Features
- Added module-info

## Fixes
- Fix for issue #176

## Features
- Move to JDK 11
- Added a constructor for nearly all properties for better FXML support

## Fixes
- Fix from Johan Falk related to gauges in tab panes
- Fix for issue #168 
- Fix from Hasan Kara related to unused imports
- Fix for some special characters by replacing them with their UTF-8 values

## Features
- Support for loading the lib on multiple child classloaders (thx to Johan Falk)

## Fixes
- Fix for issue #163 
- Fix for issue #155
- Some fixed related to the new PlainAmpSkin

## Features
- Cosmetics to ModernSkin
- Adjusted tooltip in IndicatorSkin
- Added MorphingClockSkin
- Added PlainAmpSkin

## Fixes
- Fix for issue #145 
- Fix for issue #146 
- Fix for issue #147 
- Fix for issue #157 
- Fix for issue #158

## Features
- Added another method to format numbers
- Added getTimMs and setTimeMs to Clock
- Renamed DigiClockSkin to DigitalClockSkin !!!

## Fixes
- Fix for issue #120 
- Fix for issue #129 
- Fix for issue #136 
- Fix for issue #138

## Features
- 

## Fixes
- Added locale to the formatNumber() method parameters to format the value text

## Features
- Improved formatting of value text

## Fixes
- Improved formatting of value text in many skins (fix for issue #118)

## Features


## Fixes
- Bar correctly coloured it threshold not visible. Threshold mark placed at right position.
- Zero-segment-not-highlighted-in-SIMPLE_DIGITAL-when-start-from-zero
- Bad-behaviour-when-range-does-not-contain-zero-in-SIMPLE_SECTION
- commented out line 1379 and line 1389 to fix issue #105
- Added missing event.
- Implemented startFromZero feature.
- Fixed bar drawing when min and max are negative.
- Fixed bar drawing when min and max are negative.
- Fixed zero segment not highlighted and bad clipping for positive values.
- Fixed zero segment not highlighted and bad clipping for positive values.
- Fixed behaviour and clamping when startFromZero is true
- Removed commented statements.
- Small change to add startFromZero property to MODERN skin.
- Added missing code from Helper.java.
- TRIANGLE-marker-type-badly-displayed-in-HORIZONTAL-and-VERTICAL-skins
- Fixed typo in Helper.java
- Copied PILL code from Helper.java
- Changed the size and position of the sections arc
- LCD font not updated if a resize event is missed.
- Performed the requested changes.
- Time entered when no seconds are displayed.
- Fixes to bad font switching LED visible to false.
- Some modifications related to pull-request #92
- Fixes for the LINEAR skin.
- Fixes fro DASHBOARD and SIMPLE_DIGITAL skins.
- Cosmetics
- Rollback of pull-request #90
- Fixes for AMP skin.
- Fixes for BAR, DASHBOARD and SIMPLE_SECTION skins.
- Added sections and background in BAR skin.
- Fixed font sizes to handle 3 decimals.
- Removed unused code.
- Added missing call.
- Fixed bar-background-not-updated-at-runtime-in-SIMPLE_SECTION-skin
- Added bar background update.
- Restored version number.
- Markers, threshold, and average added to AMP skin.
- Average in VSkin, HSkin and QuarterSkin
- Added average on HORIZONTAL, VERTICAL, and QUARTER skins.
- Moved value bar inside sections in MODERN skin.
- FlatSkin showing bad color outside sections (Pull-Request #81)
- LinearSkin not always shows correct bar color when usign areas (Pullrequest #80)
- Moved value bar inside sections in MODERN skin.
- Fixed: using bar color outside sections.
- LINEAR gauge bar not always displaying area colours
- Fix for issue #79
- Fix for issue #78
- Added title to SIMPLE_DIGITAL gauge skin.
- Fix for issue #73
- Fixed title not showing.
- DASHBOARD and SLIM display wrong bar color outside sections

## Features
- Section highlighting in more skins (pull-request #66)
- LCD support in more skins (pull-request #68)

## Fixes
- Fixed issue #59 (seconds cannot be hidden)
- Fixed issue #56, #62 (changing skin type during runtime)
- Fixed issue #57 (knob in clock not updated)
- Fixed issue #67 (bar in LinearSkin could exceed max value)
- Fixed issue #70 (changing rotation of LinearSkin during runtime)
- Fixed issue #65 (LED size in skins)

## Features
- 

## Fixes
- Mainly fixes related to removing listeners in skins

## Features
- 

## Fixes
- Fixed bug in SimpleSectionSkin related to bar color and sections

## Features
- 

## Fixes
- Minor fix related to visibility of sections in SimpleSkin

## Features
- 
  ## Fixes
- Minor fix related to color of am/pm text in TileClockSkin

## Features
- Added TileClockSkin
- Unit is now also shown in max value rectangle in TileTextKpiSkin

## Fixes
- Text adjustments in TileClockSkin
- Fixed second pointer location in TileClockSkin
- Threshold indicator will now be switched off correctly in LcdSkin (Issue #51)
- Adjusted aspect ratio in LcdSkin
- Fixes in several skins related to Issue #52

## Features
- Added sub title to TileSparklineSkin
- Added smoothing property to Gauge, GaugeBuilder and make use of it in TileSparklineSkin

## Fixes
- Removed some System.out.println statements
- Fixed bug in TileTextKpiSkin related to size of colored bar
- Fixed bug in TileSparklineSkin related to max value
- Fixed bug in TileTextKpiSkin when resizing
- Modified methods to set min and max value in combination with autoscale = false
- Set NodeOrientation in Gauge control always to LEFT_TO_RIGHT
- Fixed bug in TileSparklineSkin related to updating the sub title text

## Features

## 

## Fixes
- Fixed bug in Gauge related to setSkinType method with type TILE_SPARKLINE
- Fixed bug in MinimalClockSkin related to resizing
- Fixed bug in ClockSkin and PlainClockSkin where the knob was not drawn anymore
- Adjusted the default size of LcdSkin and LcdClockSkin to make it easier to have both on the same size
- Fixed but in TileKpiSkin where the unit text was not updated
- Realigned value and unit text in TileKpiSkin, TileSparklineSkin and TileTextKpiSkin

## Features

## 

## Fixes
- Moved back to manual placement instead of using TextFlow in Tile skins due to problems in JPro
- Some cosmetics related to font sizing and placement

## Features
- Added unit to TileKpiSkin

## Fixes
- Fixed problem with negative Sections in TileKpiSkin
- Fixed problem with negative Sections in SimpleSectionSkin
- Aligned value and unit font size and location accross all three Tile skins

## Features
- Added new EventType.VALUE

## Fixes
- Fixed problem when old value == new value in TileSparklineSkin

## Features
- Added TileSparklineSkin
- Added a class with methods for simple statistics

## Fixes
- Minor cosmetics in TileKpiSkin and TileTextKpiSkin

## Features
- Support for Sections in TileKpiSkin
- Support for Sections in TileTextKpiSkin
- Added an alert property to Medusa which will be used in TileKpiSkin
- Added an alert message property to Medusa which will be used in TileKpiSkin

## Fixes
- Fixed problem with threshold visibility in TileKpiSkin
- Fixed problem with maxText visibility in TileTextKpiSkin

## Features
- Added IndustrialClockSkin to library
- Added TileKpiSkin to library
- Added TileTextKpiSkin to library

## Fixes
- Fixed problem with shadows in some Clock skins

## Features
- Added DesignClockSkin to library
- Added some useful methods to Clock (e.g. setTime(long epochSeconds))

## Fixes
- Fixed some typos (capital method names etc.)
- Commented out some unused methods etc.

## Features
- Added a moving average feature to Gauge class (see blogpost here: http://harmoniccode.blogspot.de/2016/11/medusa-update.html)
- Added average support to Gauge.skin and Lcd.skin

## Fixes
- Fixed bug in Gauge.class with oldValue (did not work correctly before)
- Cosmetics in all skins related to different code structure for skins

## Features
- 

## Fixes
- Fixed bug in GaugeDesign.TILTED_GRAY (only relevant for FGauge)
- Minor cosmetics to type casting etc.

## Features
- Added support for custom fonts to Gauge and Clock
- Added TextClockSkin (makes use of custom font)

## Fixes

##

## Features
- Added simple DigitalClockSkin to library

## Fixes
- Fixed a minor bug in Gauge class

## Features
- 

## Fixes
- Adding missing code in LinearSkin redraw() method
- Removed println statement

## Features
- Added new SimpleSectionSkin to the library
- Sections will now fire an event of type SectionEvent.SECTION_UPDATE

## Fixes
-

## Features

## 

## Fixes
- Fix for resizing/redrawing problems in LinearSkin (issue #30 and #31)

## Features

## 

## Fixes
- Fix in LinearSkin and GaugeSkin related to initial visibility of valueText, titleText, subTitleText, unitText
- Fix in BulletChartSkin related to wrong placement when orientation horizontal ( issue #28 )
- Fix in Gauge related to binding and adjustment of value related to min- and maxValue

## Features

## 

## Fixes
- Fix related to initial visibility of valueText, titleText, subTitleText, unitText in several skins
- Fix in LinearSkin related to wrong placement when orientation horizontal ( issue #28 )

## Features
- Added ability to add style classes to Section and Marker (currently not in use)
- Added new property sectionsAlwaysVisible (used in IndicatorSkin)
- Added tooltip support for bar in IndicatorSkin

## Fixes
- Fix related to unit text in DashboardSkin
- Fix related to initial gauge value in skins

## Features
- Added title to IndicatorSkin
- Added ChargeSkin to library

## Fixes
- Added default constructor to FGauge so that it works in SceneBuilder
- Fixed typo in Fonts class related to Lato Bold font

## Features
- One can now set the Stops in the ConicalGradient

## Fixes
- Fixed problem related to shadow fields

## Features
- Added new BarSkin
- Added new WhiteSkin

## Fixes
- Fixed initial fill for DashboardSkin
- Renamed BUTTON_EVENT to BTN_EVENT
- Some cosmetics related to memory optimization

## Features
- Added properties for Local and NumberFormat
- Added MinimalClockSkin

## Fixes
- Fixed issue 32 (problem when section min value is smaller than gauge min value)
- cosmetics

## Features
- Added manifest header for OSGI compatibility

## Fixes
- Fixed problems related to binding functionality in Gauge and Clock

## Features

## 

## Fixes
- Fixed problem with binding of value property

## Features
- Added TimeEvents to Medusa Clock (You can hook up a listener to TimeEvents which will be fired every second. TimeEvents come with TimeEventType.SECOND, TimeEventType.MINUTE and TimeEventType.HOUR
- Added customizable tick mark length and width for SkinType.GAUGE, SkinType.HORIZONTAL and SkinType.VERTICAL (EXPERIMENTAL)
- Added a visualization for the disabled state. If the control is disabled the interactive property will be "switched off".

## Fixes
- Removed the demo package and moved the demos to the [Medusa demo project](https://github.com/HanSolo/medusademo)

## Features
- Added needle types SCIENTIFIC, AVIONIC, BIG and VARIOMETER to SkinTypes GAUGE, HORIZONTAL, VERTICAL and QUARTER
- Added property to enable/disable visibility of center knob

## Fixes
- Minor fix in build.gradle

## Features
- LcdSkin and LcdClockSkin can now be customized by using LcdDesign.CUSTOM_FLAT
- Added tickMarkRing visualization to GaugeSkin, HSkin, VSkin and QuarterSkin

## Fixes
- Corrected MinSize and MaxSize method in GaugeBuilder and ClockBuilder

## Features
- Added needleBorderColor and barBorderColor
- SimpleSkin now makes use of needleBorderColor
- Modified gradle build

## Fixes

##

## Features
- Highlight areas and sections in Gauges
- Highlight areas and sections in Clocks

##

## Features
- Added SectionSkin

##

## Features

## 

## Fixes
- Renamed the DigitalClockSkin to SlimClockSkin and made it visually more similar to the SlimSkin

## Features
- Added DigitalClockSkin

## Fixes
- Fixed problem with animated clocks

## Features
- Added SimpleDigitalSkin
- Gauge needles and Clock hands are now cached

## Fixes

##

## Features
- Added new DigitalSkin
- Added new TickMarkType.TRAPEZOID

## Fixes
- Fixed problem when visualizing time sections/areas in clocks

## Features

## 

## Fixes
- Fixed bug in gradle build script related to creation of sources.jar and javadoc.jar

## Features
- Added a threshold text to DashboardSkin
- Added javadoc to several classes

## Fixes
- Fixed problem in KpiSkin related to threshold text angle calculation
- Fixed problem in Clock related to Alarm repetition

## Features
- Added support for Alarm visualization in radial clocks
- Added AlarmMarkerEvent to Alarms (alarm markers can be pressed and show a tooltip)

## Fixes
- Fixed problem with autoscale feature in Gauge where value was always set to minValue

## Features

## \- Added RoundLcdClockSkin

## Fixes
-

## Features
- Added TickMarkType.PILL
- Added the possibility to set a custom tick label font size
- Added NeedleType.FAT (atm only for GaugeSkin)
- Implemented stop() method to Gauge (mobile requirements related to sleep mode etc.)
- Replaced LocalDateTime with ZonedDateTime
- Added FatClockSkin
- Added discrete hours to Clock
- Added tick label color to Clock
- Added NeedleBehavior (EXPERIMENTAL, only for very rare setups)

- Added first version of LinearSkin
- Added TimeSection to use as Section and Area in Clock

# Fixes
-

## Features
- Added PearClockSkin
- Added PlainClockSkin
- Added DBClockSkin
- Added shadows to clocks

## Fixes
- Replaced discreteSteps by discreteSeconds and discreteMinutes

## Features
- Added a Clock control with an analog ClockSkin
- Added a LcdClockSkin
- Added Alarms

## Fixes
- Some minor cosmetics

## Features

## Fixes
- Contains fix for issue #16 
- Contains further modifications related to JavaFXPorts compatibility

## Features
- Version 2.6 should now be compatible with JavaFXPorts (JavaFX on Android and iOS)

## Fixes
- Replaced String.join calls with StringBuilder
- Replaced Streams with for loops

## Features

## Fixes
- Removed reflection from GaugeBuilder
- Added new constructor to Gauge that takes a SkinType to instantiate the selected skin directly
- Removed the -fx-skin property from the gauge.css

## Features
- Sections and Markers will now always be sorted to have them in right order

## Fixes
- Some cosmetics to SimpleSkin

## Features

## Fixes
- Fixed problem with sections with a start value smaller than minValue
- Fixed problem with autoscaling during initialization

## Features

## Fixes
- Fixed problem when tickmark type == null
- Fixed issue #15 by implementing new EventType.SECTION

## Features
- Added threshold indicator to DashboardSkin
- Added new property oldValueVisible (atm only needed for LcdSkin)
- Improved scaling in BulletChartSkin

## Fixes
- Fixed issue #13 (gradient bar in DashboardSkin)

## Features
- Support for sections in LevelSkin
- Support for dynamic color change in BatterySkin

## Fixes
- LcdDesign.SECTIONS in combination with Sections makes it possible to dynamically change the Lcd color
- Modifications related to section loading

## Features
- Added a simple battery skin
- Added a level skin (thanx to René Jahn for the idea)

## Fixes
- Fixed problem with check sections and areas for value in HSkin, VSkin, QuarterSkin and GaugeSkin
- Fixed problem with setting values in DashboardSkin and SpaceXSkin (issue #10)

## Features
- Added TinySkin
- Added support for dynamic color change in LcdSkin with LcdDesign.SECTIONS
- Added toString() method to Gauge with JSON output

## Fixes
- Background and border style in KpiSkin and IndicatorSkin 
- Removed unnecessary calls related to min and max measured values in HSkin, VSkin and Quarterskin
- Reduced LcdSkin by one node

## Features
- Added threshold indicator to LcdSkin

## Fixes
- Modified the min and max measured value behaviour

## Features
- Added LcdSkin
- Added variable angle range (90 - 180 degrees) to IndicatorSkin and KpiSkin

## Fixes
- Problem with min values smaller or greater than 0 in DashboardSkin, IndicatorSkin and KpiSkin (issue #7)
- Problem with placement of min and max value text in KpiSkin
- Problem related to text size adjustments (issue #8)

## Features
- 

## Fixes
- Renamed all methods that started with areXXX to getXXX for compatibility reasons
- Fixed size and location of threshold indicator in HSkin and VSkin
- Fixed text position in lcd display in HSkin

## Features
- The angle range in HSkin and VSkin can be adjusted between 90 and 180 degrees

## Fixes
- Length of needle in HSkin fixed

## Features
- Added MarkerType.BOX

## Fixes
- Fixed problems with sizing in HSkin and VSkin
- Fixed problems with Sections, Areas, Markers and GradientBar in HSkin, VSkin and QuarterSkin

## Features
- It's possible to add custom tick labels as a list of Strings
- Two new skins HSkin (horizontal with 180° range) and VSkin (vertical with 180° range)

## Fixes
- Problems with gradient bar in QuarterSkin

Features:
- added new QuarterSkin
- added new property to set the knob position (needed for QuarterSkin)

Features
- Added a SkinType enum and property to Gauge which makes it possible to switch between Skins in SceneBuilder

Fixes
- Fixed a problem with the BorderStrokes in the ENZO GaugeDesign

Contains bugfix related to blinking of led in GaugeSkin. Also added a tooltip to IndicatorSkin that could be enabled by setValueVisible(true). When using the IndicatorSkin with the GaugeBuilder it will automatically add three stops to the gradientStops that can be enabled with setColorGradientEnabled(true)
Added another very simple IndicatorSkin
Contains minor fixes and a new KpiSkin which might be useful to visualize Key Performance Indicators in Dashboards.
Contains fixes related to Text positioning and Text sizing. Also contains fixes in SpaceXSkin related to correct drawing of bar. Threshold will be adjusted if min- or maxValue changed.

Added support for color gradient and negative minValues in SlimSkin and FlatSkin. Support for sections in SlimSkin, FlatSkin and DashboardSkin. Also slimmed down the usage of ListChangeListeners in GaugeSkin and used custom redraw events instead.

This release mainly contains two new demos and some minor fixes. The demos can be found in the new demos package. There is one demo (GaugeDemo) that shows how to use the standard Medusa gauge with most of it's features. You will find the description in the code.
The other demo (FGaugeDemo) shows how to use the framed gauges that will add a styled frame and background to the standard Medusa gauge by wrapping it in another control. Here you will also find the explanations in the code.
